attributes.action: stop the No10 petition team from down right discrimination of submitted petitions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The petition team have a very one sided idea of acceptiing or rejecting petitions. it would seem that the indigenous people of this country have alot fewer rights than the minority groups, and this has to change
I demand the prime minister seek to change the policies of the petition teams, and make the petition submition fairer and less biased across the board...what makes me think the petition team will reject this one!!!
